recommended_degree: Akuntansi, Ekonomi, Administrasi Keuangan, Administrasi Pajak, Keuangan (Sarjana)
job_description:
This position are require to :
- Have a strong English skill (spoken and written), able to speak Chinese is a plus
- Willing to be place at the various project in Indonesia 

Scoop of duties :
- Help to provide general finance  support to the finance team in head quarter.
- Assist with organizing and maintaining financial files, Receipt, Invoice and documents.
- Help to provide day-to-day financial support to the Project Manager, ensuring accurate budgeting, expenditure tracking, and financial reporting.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to execute financial tasks, streamline processes, and contribute to the achievement of project objectives.
